body.name: Universal Magnetic Tripod Mount Adapter for All Phones, Jkoailiwi 17mm Ball Head & 1/4 inch Port Phone Holder for Tripod, Selfie Stick, Ring Light, Compatible with Magsafe iPhone 15/14/13/12
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 9 hrs 19 mins
features: ✨【Perfect Phone Holder for Video Recording】Using this magnetic phone tripod mount adapter, you can quickly attach your phone to any device with a 1/4'' screw, such as a tripod, selfie stick, or ring light. This feature is especially beneficial for taking photos or videos, as it allows for easy adjustment of the angle and orientation of your shots

✨【Wide Applicability】The adapter features a 17mm ball joint that allows you to easily attach it to a variety of holders with 17mm ball heads, such as a gooseneck bed phone holder, car console mount, or desktop phone stand. This provides you with a flexible and versatile solution for mounting your phone in a range of different settings

✨【Easy to Use】Compared with the traditional clip holder, the Jkoailiwi Magsafe phone mount attachment features a strong magnetic suction cup that allows you to easily mount your phone on the holder in just one second, eliminating the need for complicated installation steps

✨【More Flexible】 The phone mount for the tripod offers 360° rotation and 60° tilt angle adjustment, which can be securely locked into any position, providing you with both landscape and portrait view modes. This enables you to easily customize the angle and orientation of your shots to suit your specific needs
✨【Lightweight and Portable】The phone tripod holder adapter is lightweight and portable, weighing only 30g, making it a great choice for travel photography
✨【Wide Compatibility】This mount adapter is compatible with iPhone 12/13/14 series and we give away a MagSafe ring that all mobile phones can be used directly with this

✨【What will you get】1* magnetic phone mount for tripod, 1* metal ring, 1* 17mm ball joint, 1* 1/4'' mini ball head, 1* alcohol pack. ❤️If you experience any problems, please contact us the first time, we offer a two-year warranty and free lifetime technical support❤️
body.description: 2023 Revolutionary Magsafe Tripod Phone Mount The best phone holder for video recording Perfect Phone Holder for Video RecordingWide Applicability, mounting your phone in a range of different holdersEliminating the need for complicated installation steps360° rotation and 60° tilt angle adjustment, more flexibleLightweight and portable, great choice for travel photographyWide compatibility, suitable for all phones It's recommended to use metal ring to enhance magnet Please do not screw the nut of the 17mm ball joint too tightly to avoid affecting the adjustment of angle and rotation

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 2024 Revolutionary Magnetic Tripod Phone Mount Adapter Q: If I don't have a magsafe phone case, can it be adapted?? A: Of course! There is a MagSafe ring in the package, You can stick it to the back of the regular phone case before use. (The magnet will be stronger if use a magnetic ring)

Tips : Use with iPhone 15/14/13/12 Series directlySupport magnetic caseThe Android phones and regular cases need to install metal rings before useIt is not recommended to attach the metal ring directly to your phone backYou can use the metal ring to enhance magnetism

Strong Magnetic Force Using the industry's best N52 magnet, the magnetic force can reach 2.68 pounds, which is equivalent to the weight of six iPhone13 Pro Lightweight and Portable This iPhone tripod mount is very compact and it can easily be carried in your pocket or pocketbook. 360° Rotation + 60° Tilt Angle Adjustment This feature is especially beneficial for taking photos or videos, as it allows for easy adjustment of the angle and orientation of your shots

The multi-functional phone mount with a universal 1 /4" screw hole and a 17mm ball joint, greatly expands the use range and purpose of the tripod and can be safely connected to almost all phone holders and tripods, ring lights, etc.

What's in the box? Magsafe tripod phone mount adapter x1Magsafe ring x11/4'' screw 17mm ball x11/4'' screw mini ball head x1Alcohol pack x1 2023 Revolutionary Magsafe Tripod Phone Mount The best phone holder for video recording Perfect Phone Holder for Video RecordingWide Applicability, mounting your phone in a range of different holdersEliminating the need for complicated installation steps360° rotation and 60° tilt angle adjustment, more flexibleLightweight and portable, great choice for travel photographyWide compatibility, suitable for all phones It's recommended to use metal ring to enhance magnet Please do not screw the nut of the 17mm ball joint too tightly to avoid affecting the adjustment of angle and rotation

What is the difference between this iPhone tripod mount adapter and the others? Use a strong magnetic suction cup, one second to mount the phone on the tripod holder360° rotation and 60° tilt angle adjustment, and we give away a 1/4'' ball head that makes your mobile phone shooting more professionalLightweight, small in size, and easy to carry

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This MagSafe mount is delivered quickly and work great with my tripod. I bought this mount to make it easier when using my tripod to take pictures. I hate the struggle when using a phone holder and want a faster way to attach my phone to my tripod. This mount is the perfect solution. Now I can just put my iphone on the mount, take pictures and then just grab it and go. The magnet is pretty strong (my phone has a Magsafe case on) and I can move my phone to any direction I like, which makes taking pictures a lot easier. I need to reach out to customer service and they get back to me very quickly. Very happy with their customer service. Will recommend to everyone who wants to replace their annoying regular phone holder to this convenient mount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very strong magnet!!
reviews.reviewText: I placed the product on top of a tripod I used at my desk. I enjoy the strong grip and how easy it is to attach to other devices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great compact MagSafe phone mount
reviews.reviewText: Used on a very recent trip in conjunction with a tripod extension and clamp. It was the perfect setup for family photos on a recent trip. The clamp was attached to the handle of the stroller and with the extension raised the phone more than high enough to get a natural angle for the photo. This mount was more than secure enough to hold the phone but was super quick to mount/unmount the phone. Was able to compose the photo exactly how I wanted it and did not need to hope that some random stranger captured the photo the way I envisioned, which on average something I wanted is cut out of the photo. The only caveat is I accidentally dropped the mount attached to the solid tripod extension and the combined weight broke the MagSafe mount at the neck. Unfortunately did it twice and broke at the same spot, but luckily nothing a little bit of super glue couldn't fix and saved the rest of the vacation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Adhesive won't stick, small mount limits placement.
reviews.reviewText: The double sided sticky tape wouldn't work, even after following the enclosed instruction. It would detach after a day. Although photos show it attached to a textured sloped surface, it didn't. The small size of the mount itself, although elegant and unobtrusive, may keep it from being placed in a convenient spot.I returned it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I love that it is easy to put my phone on a tripod now. The magnet is strong enough to hold my phone with the MagSafe case and wallet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: don't waste your money! the magnet is just a joke! so weak.So cheap. My felt down after one day of use. Stay away from this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This worked much better than I expected. Super easy to use. I got many great pictures from our family holiday this weekend. Can’t wait to use when out at the park with the dog!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve tried many other mounts and this one works best.
